code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/christyolotu/vidly/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import http from"./httpService";import{apiUrl}from"../config.json";var apiEndpoint=apiUrl+"/movies";function movieUrl(id){return"".concat(apiEndpoint,"/").concat(id);}export function getMovies(){return http.get(apiEndpoint);}export function getMovie(movieId){return http.get(movieUrl(movieId));}export function saveMovie(movie){if(movie._id){var body=_objectSpread({},movie);delete body._id;return http.put(movieUrl(movie._id),body);}return http.post(apiEndpoint,movie);}export function deleteMovie(movieId){return http.delete(movieUrl(movieId));}
